page.title: 11FARMING
page.content: Most of the farmland is in the Brampton /West Melton Sector and contains Brampton Ellis{environmental {centre}which is a farm used as a educational resource for schools to visit.The farm opposite is owned by Mr{Brooke}.He has 900{pigs}fed by cone shape feeder containing pellet food in which are corn and vitamins. The feeder holds 1 tonne and every 2 weeks the food is blown into it.Mr Brooke kepts a tally on a plastic circular disk so that he knows which pig is pregnant and which sow has had piglets.He has 2 land race boars and a large white boar.He sells approximately 2280piglets a year.Much of the arable land is used for{cereal {crops}and rape which is for {animal} fodder.
